channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Billionaire Warren Buffett Says '$1 Million Isn't Going To Make You Happy' Because Once You See Someone With $2 Million, 'Your Happiness Will Disappear'
A United flight u-turned over the Atlantic coast when a passenger's laptop fell through a gap into the plane's hold
'Shameful' photo of home with 600 live-in staff sparks outrage online: 'The person who lives in there should be concerned ...'
Investigation after woman left behind by cruise ship dies on island
WWI soldiers' messages in a bottle found on Australian beach more than 100 years later
Hurricane Melissa live updates: Storm strikes Cuba after tearing through Jamaica
item.description: Hurricane Melissa was one of the most powerful storms to make landfall in the Atlantic Basin.

item.title: Raid on gang in Rio leaves over 100 people dead, including police officers
item.description: The police operation was one of the most violent in Brazil's recent history, with human rights organizations calling for investigations into the death...

item.title: "Extremely dangerous" Hurricane Melissa lashing Cuba after pounding Jamaica
item.description: Hurricane Melissa made landfall over eastern Cuba early Wednesday as an "extremely dangerous" Category 3 storm, forecasters said, after pummeling Jama...

item.title: Hurricane Melissa tracker: Following storm's path after historic landfall in Jamaica
item.description: Hurricane Melissa is now continuing its path of destruction through the Caribbean.

item.title: Uber plans to offer autonomous taxi rides in San Francisco starting next year
item.description: Uber said Wednesday that the San Francisco Bay Area will be the first market for its specially built autonomous taxi, which is expected to launch in l...

item.title: Federal trial to start over Trumpâ€™s efforts to deploy the National Guard in Portland, Oregon
item.description: A federal trial over whether President Donald Trump can deploy the National Guard to Portland, Oregon, is set to begin Wednesday.

item.title: OpenAI strikes major deal with Microsoft
item.description: OpenAI and Microsoft reached a deal to complete the startup's shift to for-profit. Jason Hiner, editor in chief for ZDNET, joins to break down the dea...

item.title: 10/29: CBS Morning News
item.description: Hurricane Melissa moves into Cuba as Jamaica surveys catastrophic damage; Microsoft and OpenAI announce a restructuring deal.

item.title: Israel says ceasefire resumes after dozens killed in fresh Gaza strikes
item.description: Israel says it has "renewed enforcement of the ceasefire" after deadly airstrikes in Gaza that tested the U.S.-brokered peace deal.

item.title: WATCH: Hurricane Melissa has made landfall in Jamaica as a Category 5 hurricane
item.description: Melissa is set to bring catastrophic winds, rain, flooding and storm surge to Jamaica, where residents and tourists are sheltering in place.

item.title: Judge orders daily meetings with Border Patrol official Bovino on Chicago immigration crackdown

item.title: Court disqualifies Trump-appointed US attorney from overseeing multiple criminal cases
